title: How to Fight Mold and Mildew in Your Home or Office
description: Everyone has encountered mold or mildew, whether it be some fruit left out too long or a cup of water forgotten somewhere in your home or office. title: Electrostatic Disinfectant Sprays for Gyms
description: Electrostatic disinfectant spray has become a game-changer for gyms and fitness centers. With every company looking for ways to safely allow their customers and members back, gyms have found it particularly tough. So tough that staples in the industry, like Gold’s Gym, are being forced to file for bankruptcy. When patrons are covered in sweat and touching every piece of equipment, what can be done to disinfect the gym environment safely and quickly? Many gyms are turning to electrostatic disinfection as the answer.

title: How to Pick an Industrial Floor Cleaning Provider
description: If you own or help to manage an office space or a factory, you might want to consider outsourcing your floor cleaning to an industrial services provider. An industrial cleaner will be able to wash, rinse, and polish your floors much more quickly and thoroughly than a one-man crew or an intern with a mop.Moreover, qualified and professional industrial cleaners will have the expertise and tools necessary to ensure that they’ll leave your floors as clean as the day your business opened.It’s easy to see why you’d want to hire an industrial floor cleaner, but where can you find a great provider of industrial floor cleaning services? When doing your research for a new commercial cleaning company that can make a good partner, there are two primary qualities to look for.

title: The 3 Most Common Carpet Stains in Your Home and How to Fix Them
